sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ResCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(5, CAST ((SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS INTEGER) * MII.NodesPerModel) != COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ResCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd)

SELECT 'CPU' AS Dimension, 'Load Variance' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, (CAST((SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS INTEGER) * MII.NodesPerModel)) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, CS_MachineSetInstanceMap AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_CpuLoadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, CpuLoad, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT LoadIter.IterationNum AS Iteration, LoadIter.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, LoadIter.True AS True, LoadIter.False AS False, LoadIter.True + LoadIter.False AS TotalMeasurements, LoadIter.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - LoadIter.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, TestCriteria.CpuLoadVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN LoadIter.False/(LoadIter.True + LoadIter.False) * 100.0 >= TestCriteria.CpuLoadVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, LoadIter.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, LoadIter.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS LoadIter, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND LoadIter.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=LoadIter.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_CpuLoadVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterCpuLoadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.CpuProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(TD.AvgVal * 100.0, 2) AS ActualAvgCpuLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentCpuSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='CPU_UTILIZATION' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET CpuVerdict=(SELECT Res.IterVerdict FROM CS_IterCpuLoadVarRealTimeResults AS Res, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Res.Iteration=Iter.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN AgentSum.SuccessRate > AgentSum.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterMemWriteLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_MemReadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentMemSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, TvlpLoadConfig as LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_READ_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgMemReadLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_MemReadLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentMemSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_READ_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_MemWriteVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentMemSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, TvlpLoadConfig as LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_WRITE_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.MemProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgMemWriteLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0 , 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_MemWriteLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentMemSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_WRITE_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET MemVerdict=(SELECT (CASE WHEN ReadVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR ReadLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END) FROM CS_IterMemReadVarRealTimeResults AS ReadVar, CS_IterMemReadLatRealTimeResults AS ReadLat, CS_IterMemWriteVarRealTimeResults AS WriteVar, CS_IterMemWriteLatRealTimeResults AS WriteLat, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Iter.Iteration=ReadVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=ReadLat.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteLat.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)
SELECT CASE WHEN EnableNetTestCriteria='False' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_TestCriteria

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetReadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT NetReadVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, NetReadVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, NetReadVar.True AS True, NetReadVar.False AS False, NetReadVar.True + NetReadVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, NetReadVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - NetReadVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.NetReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN NetReadVar.False/(NetReadVar.True + NetReadVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.NetReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, NetReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetReadVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_NetReadVar AS NetReadVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND NetReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=NetReadVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetReadVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_NetReadVarResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_NetReadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetReadLatResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT NetReadLat.IterationNum AS Iteration, NetReadLat.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, NetReadLat.True AS True, NetReadLat.False AS False, NetReadLat.True + NetReadLat.False AS TotalMeasurements, NetReadLat.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - NetReadLat.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, TRC.Threshold AS AcceptableLatency, CS_TestCriteria.NetReadRateLatencySuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN NetReadLat.False/(NetReadLat.True + NetReadLat.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.NetReadRateLatencySuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, NetReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetReadLat.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_NetReadLat AS NetReadLat, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND NetReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=NetReadLat.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetReadLatSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_NetReadLatResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_NetReadLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetWriteVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT NetWriteVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, NetWriteVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, NetWriteVar.True AS True, NetWriteVar.False AS False, NetWriteVar.True + NetWriteVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, NetWriteVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - NetWriteVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.NetWriteRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN NetWriteVar.False/(NetWriteVar.True + NetWriteVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.NetWriteRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, NetWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetWriteVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_NetWriteVar AS NetWriteVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND NetWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=NetWriteVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetWriteVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_NetWriteVarResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_NetWriteVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetWriteLatResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT NetWriteLat.IterationNum AS Iteration, NetWriteLat.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, NetWriteLat.True AS True, NetWriteLat.False AS False, NetWriteLat.True + NetWriteLat.False AS TotalMeasurements, NetWriteLat.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - NetWriteLat.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, TRC.Threshold AS AcceptableLatency, CS_TestCriteria.NetWriteRateLatencySuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN NetWriteLat.False/(NetWriteLat.True + NetWriteLat.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.NetWriteRateLatencySuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, NetWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, NetWriteLat.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_NetWriteLat AS NetWriteLat, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND NetWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=NetWriteLat.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NetWriteLatSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_NetWriteLatResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_NetWriteLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterNetReadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterNetReadLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterNetWriteVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterNetWriteLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_NetReadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentNetSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, TvlpLoadConfig as LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='NETWORK_READ_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgNetReadLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_NetReadLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentNetSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='NETWORK_READ_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_NetWriteVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentNetSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, TvlpLoadConfig AS LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='NETWORK_WRITE_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.NetProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgNetWriteLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Res.AcceptableLatency AS MaxAcceptableNetWriteLat FROM CS_NetWriteLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentNetSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='NETWORK_WRITE_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET NetVerdict=(SELECT (CASE WHEN ReadVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR ReadLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END) FROM CS_IterNetReadVarRealTimeResults AS ReadVar, CS_IterNetReadLatRealTimeResults AS ReadLat, CS_IterNetWriteVarRealTimeResults AS WriteVar, CS_IterNetWriteLatRealTimeResults AS WriteLat, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Iter.Iteration=ReadVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=ReadLat.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteLat.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)
SELECT CASE WHEN EnableStorTestCriteria='False' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_TestCriteria

sql_statement.static: SELECT TD.AgentHostname, TD.Statistic, TD.MinVal, TD.MaxVal, TD.AvgVal FROM Tdigest_AgentIterSummStats AS TD WHERE TD.Iteration=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND TD.Statistic IN ('BLOCK_READ_RATE', 'BLOCK_READ_LATENCY', 'BLOCK_WRITE_RATE', 'BLOCK_WRITE_LATENCY', 'BLOCK_READ_VARIANCE', 'BLOCK_WRITE_VARIANCE')

SELECT StorReadVar.IterationNum AS IterationNum, StorReadVar.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, StorReadVar.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, StorReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorReadVar.True AS True, StorReadVar.False AS False, ROUND((StorReadVar.True / (StorReadVar.True + StorReadVar.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM StorageReadVariance AS StorReadVar WHERE StorReadVar.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT StorReadLat.IterationNum AS IterationNum, StorReadLat.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, StorReadLat.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, StorReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorReadLat.True AS True, StorReadLat.False AS False, ROUND((StorReadLat.True / (StorReadLat.True + StorReadLat.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM StorageReadLatency AS StorReadLat WHERE StorReadLat.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT StorWriteVar.IterationNum AS IterationNum, StorWriteVar.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, StorWriteVar.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, StorWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorWriteVar.True AS True, StorWriteVar.False AS False, ROUND((StorWriteVar.True / (StorWriteVar.True + StorWriteVar.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM StorageWriteVariance AS StorWriteVar WHERE StorWriteVar.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT StorWriteLat.IterationNum AS IterationNum, StorWriteLat.IteratorCurrVal AS IteratorCurrVal, StorWriteLat.InstanceHnd AS InstanceHnd, StorWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorWriteLat.True AS True, StorWriteLat.False AS False, ROUND((StorWriteLat.True / (StorWriteLat.True + StorWriteLat.False) * 100.0), 2) AS FailureRate FROM StorageWriteLatency AS StorWriteLat WHERE StorWriteLat.IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)
SELECT AgentHostname, Iteration, Statistic, MinVal, MaxVal,AvgVal FROM Tdigest_AgentIterSummStats WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND Statistic LIKE 'BLOCK%'

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ResCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(5, CAST ((SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS INTEGER) * MII.NodesPerModel) != COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ResCount FROM CS_StorReadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd)

SELECT 'Storage' AS Dimension, 'Read Variance' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, (CAST((SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS INTEGER) * MII.NodesPerModel)) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_StorReadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, CS_MachineSetInstanceMap AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorReadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT StorReadVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, StorReadVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, StorReadVar.True AS True, StorReadVar.False AS False, StorReadVar.True + StorReadVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, StorReadVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - StorReadVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.StorReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN StorReadVar.False/(StorReadVar.True + StorReadVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.StorReadRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, StorReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorReadVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_StorReadVar AS StorReadVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND StorReadVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=StorReadVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorReadVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_StorReadVarResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_StorReadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorReadLatResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, StorReadSize, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT StorReadLat.IterationNum AS Iteration, StorReadLat.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, StorReadLat.True AS True, StorReadLat.False AS False, StorReadLat.True + StorReadLat.False AS TotalMeasurements, StorReadLat.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - StorReadLat.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, TRC.Threshold AS AcceptableLatency, CS_TestCriteria.StorReadRateLatencySuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN StorReadLat.False/(StorReadLat.True + StorReadLat.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.StorReadRateLatencySuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, StorReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorReadLat.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_StorReadLat AS StorReadLat, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND StorReadLat.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=StorReadLat.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorReadLatSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_StorReadLatResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_StorReadLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorWriteVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT StorWriteVar.IterationNum AS Iteration, StorWriteVar.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, StorWriteVar.True AS True, StorWriteVar.False AS False, StorWriteVar.True + StorWriteVar.False AS TotalMeasurements, StorWriteVar.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - StorWriteVar.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, CS_TestCriteria.StorWriteRateVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN StorWriteVar.False/(StorWriteVar.True + StorWriteVar.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.StorWriteRateVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, StorWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorWriteVar.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_StorWriteVar AS StorWriteVar, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND StorWriteVar.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=StorWriteVar.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorWriteVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_StorWriteVarResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_StorWriteVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorWriteLatResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)

SELECT StorWriteLat.IterationNum AS Iteration, StorWriteLat.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, StorWriteLat.True AS True, StorWriteLat.False AS False, StorWriteLat.True + StorWriteLat.False AS TotalMeasurements, StorWriteLat.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - StorWriteLat.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, TRC.Threshold AS AcceptableLatency, CS_TestCriteria.StorWriteRateLatencySuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN StorWriteLat.False/(StorWriteLat.True + StorWriteLat.False) * 100.0 >= CS_TestCriteria.StorWriteRateLatencySuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, StorWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, StorWriteLat.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_StorWriteLat AS StorWriteLat, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS CS_TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND StorWriteLat.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=StorWriteLat.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_StorWriteLatSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableLatency, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_StorWriteLatResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration

SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_StorWriteLatSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterStorReadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterStorReadLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterStorWriteVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterStorWriteLatAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_StorReadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentStorSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, TvlpLoadConfig as LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='BLOCK_READ_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgStorReadLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_StorReadLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentStorSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='BLOCK_READ_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_StorWriteVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentStorSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map, TvlpLoadConfig AS LoadConf WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='BLOCK_WRITE_RATE' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Map.ProfileId=LoadConf.Id

SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.StorProfileName AS ProfileName, Res.AcceptableLatency AS AcceptableLatency, ROUND(CAST(TD.AvgVal AS FLOAT), 2) AS ActualAvgStorWriteLat, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_StorWriteLatResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentStorSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='BLOCK_WRITE_LATENCY' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET StorVerdict=(SELECT (CASE WHEN ReadVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR ReadLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR WriteLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END) FROM CS_IterStorReadVarRealTimeResults AS ReadVar, CS_IterStorReadLatRealTimeResults AS ReadLat, CS_IterStorWriteVarRealTimeResults AS WriteVar, CS_IterStorWriteLatRealTimeResults AS WriteLat, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Iter.Iteration=ReadVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=ReadLat.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteVar.Iteration AND Iter.Iteration=WriteLat.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)

UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET IterVerdict=(SELECT CASE WHEN Verd.CpuVerdict='FAIL' OR Verd.MemVerdict='FAIL' OR Verd.NetVerdict='FAIL' OR Verd.StorVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END FROM CS_VerdictSummary AS Verd, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Iter.Iteration=Verd.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)
SELECT CASE WHEN EnableCpuTestCriteria='False' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_TestCriteria

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Sampled agents did not generate CPU load within the specified variance criteria.
report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Sampled agents generated CPU load within the specified variance criteria.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarSum) = 'FAIL' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT Agent.AgentHostname AS 'Agent Hostname', Map.ModelDispName AS Template, Map.NodeName AS Node, Map.CpuProfileName AS 'Load Profile', (SELECT ROUND(TD.AvgVal * 100, 2) FROM CS_IterCpuAgentTdigestSumResults AS TD WHERE Agent.AgentHostname=TD.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='CPU_UTILIZATION') AS 'Actual Average CPU Load (%)', Agent.TotalMeasurements AS 'Total Threshold Checks', Agent.True AS 'Failed Threshold Checks', Agent.SuccessRate AS 'Agent Success Rate (%) (Total - Failed) / Total' FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Agent, CS_CpuLoadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE Agent.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Agent.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Sum.Verdict='FAIL'

sql_statement.static: SELECT Agent.AgentHostname AS 'Agent Hostname', Map.ModelDispName AS Template, Map.NodeName AS Node, Map.MemProfileName AS 'Load Profile', Agent.AcceptableLatency AS 'Defined Acceptable Latency (ns)', (SELECT ROUND(TD.AvgVal, 2) FROM CS_IterMemAgentTdigestSumResults AS TD WHERE Agent.AgentHostname=TD.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='MEMORY_READ_LATENCY') AS 'Actual Average Memory Read Latency (ns)', Agent.TotalMeasurements AS 'Total Threshold Checks', Agent.True AS 'Failed Threshold Checks', Agent.SuccessRate AS 'Agent Success Rate (%) (Total - Failed) / Total' FROM CS_MemReadLatResults AS Agent, CS_MemReadLatSum AS Sum, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE Agent.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Agent.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND Sum.Verdict='FAIL'

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VM_Snapshot_Start (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FlavorId STRING, FlavorName, Count INTEGER, CpuCores INTEGER, MemoryMb INTEGER, DiskInfo)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VM_Snapshot_End (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FlavorId STRING, FlavorName, Count INTEGER, CpuCores INTEGER, MemoryMb INTEGER, DiskInfo)

SELECT Info.FlavorId, Info.FlavorName, Info.Count, Info.CpuCores, Info.MemoryMb, GROUP_CONCAT(PRINTF('%s: %s %s', DiskInfo.Name, DiskInfo.Size, DiskInfo.SizeUnit), ', ') AS 'DiskInfo' FROM vm_snapshot_start_info AS Info, vm_snapshot_start_disk_info AS DiskInfo WHERE Info.FlavorId=DiskInfo.FlavorId GROUP BY Info.FlavorName ORDER BY Info.FlavorName, DiskInfo.DiskIndex

SELECT Info.FlavorId, Info.FlavorName, Info.Count, Info.CpuCores, Info.MemoryMb, GROUP_CONCAT(PRINTF('%s: %s %s', DiskInfo.Name, DiskInfo.Size, DiskInfo.SizeUnit), ', ') AS 'DiskInfo' FROM vm_snapshot_end_info AS Info, vm_snapshot_end_disk_info AS DiskInfo WHERE Info.FlavorId=DiskInfo.FlavorId GROUP BY Info.FlavorName ORDER BY Info.FlavorName, DiskInfo.DiskIndex

report.explanation: Summary of VM Snapshot information.
report.display_name: Running VMs Not Included in Test

sql_statement.static: SELECT Start.FlavorName AS 'Name', Start.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Start.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Start.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', Start.Count AS 'Start Count', (End.Count - Start.Count) AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_Start AS Start, VM_Snapshot_End AS End WHERE Start.FlavorId=End.FlavorId
UNION

SELECT Info.FlavorName AS 'Name', Info.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Info.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Info.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', Info.Count AS 'Start Count', PRINTF('-%d', Info.Count) AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_Start AS Info WHERE Info.FlavorId NOT IN (SELECT FlavorId FROM VM_Snapshot_End)
UNION

SELECT Info.FlavorName AS 'Name', Info.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Info.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Info.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', 0 AS 'Start Count', Info.Count AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_End AS Info WHERE Info.FlavorId NOT IN (SELECT FlavorId FROM VM_Snapshot_Start)
